description.selection: A comprehensive base ecommerce store template with product catalog, shopping cart, checkout flow, and responsive design. Perfect for building any type of online store - fashion, electronics, general retail, or specialized ecommerce applications. Features a warm cream aesthetic with terracotta accents, local cart persistence, product search, and beautiful animations. Built with React 18, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
description.usage:
This is the base ecommerce store template. It provides a complete foundation for building online stores with:

**Core Features:**
- Product catalog with grid/list views
- Shopping cart with local storage persistence
- Product search functionality
- Product detail pages with add-to-cart
- Checkout process with Stripe integration hooks
- Success/confirmation page
- Responsive design for all devices
- Beautiful animations and micro-interactions

**Tech Stack:**
- React 18+ with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- React Router for navigation
- Lucide React for icons
- Local Storage for cart state

**Design System:**
- Warm cream color palette (#faf8f5 base)
- Terracotta accent colors (#d95f3d primary)
- Fraunces serif for headings
- Source Sans 3 for body text
- Smooth animations and hover effects

**DO NOT TOUCH FILES:**
- package.json
- vite.config.ts
- tsconfig.json
- tsconfig.app.json
- tsconfig.node.json
- tailwind.config.js
- postcss.config.cjs
- eslint.config.js

**Template Structure:**
- src/components/ - Reusable UI components (Header, Footer, ProductCard)
- src/pages/ - Page components (Home, Products, ProductDetail, Cart, Success)
- src/context/ - React Context providers (CartContext)
- src/api/ - API client and types
- public/ - Static assets

**API Integration:**
The template uses an API client in src/api/client.ts that connects to:
- VITE_API_URL environment variable (default: http://localhost:8787)
- VITE_STORE_SLUG environment variable (default: demo-store)

Customize this template for your specific ecommerce needs. The base structure supports any product type and can be extended with additional features like user authentication, wishlists, reviews, and more.
